replies.ask_name: May I have your name, please?
replies.party_ask_venue: At what venue is the party taking place?
replies.party_ask_host: Could you provide me with the name of the host, please?
replies.party_ask_arrival_time: When are you planning to arrive at the party?
replies.party_ask_number_of_guests: How many guests will you be bringing with you?
replies.party_ask_parking_needed: Do you require parking at the venue?
replies.party_ask_dietary_restrictions: Do you have any dietary restrictions?
replies.party_confirm_rsvp: Great, your rsvp is all done and confirmed!
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.party_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no parties on our system that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you to rsvp to a party.
